div.pre: 1447 Asia Minor?, 1950 Burial: c. 240 B.C. (M) Contents: 58+ AR Alexander III: 3 early post. tetradr. (Am- phipolis 1, Tarsus? 1, Aradus 1) 4 early post. dr. (Abydus 1, unc. 3) 2 late post. tetradr. (unc.) 1 late post. dr. (Miletus) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 3 tetradr. (Amphi- polis) 1 dr. (Tarsus) Lysimachus: 12 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 1, Lysimacheia 1, Lampsacus 2, Magnesia 1, unc. 7) 2 lifetime dr. (Magnesia 1, Ephesus 1) 9 post. tetradr. (Aenus 1, Cius 3, unc. 5) Eumenes I and Attalus I: 10 tetradr. Antiochus I: 8 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 4, Antiocheia 2, unc. 2) 2 dr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Antiochus II: 1 dr. (Antiocheia) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1963, p. 26, note 1 (c. 250 B.C.). The Pergamene series includes coins of Attalus I
